pages.text: $(li)Nether Wastes are a barren biome composed mostly of Netherrack.$(br)$(li)They can be found in the Nether,$(br)$(li)You can find Planted Quartz and Netherrack Speleothem here.

$(li)Some creatures such as $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/zombified_piglin)Zombified Piglin$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/piglin)Piglin$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/ghast)Ghasts$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/magma_cube)Magma Cubes$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/enderman)Endermen$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/strider)Striders$(/l) can be found here too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)Nether Wastes$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
